1596360.name: Unnatural Investigations
1596360.description:
Demons have found a way through to our dimension. A special group was created to combat this and you are a part of this group. Choose a mission location, clear enemies, search for special items and clues, and summon and destroy the boss.

Each level has its enemy types and look, and bosses are randomized. Bosses have different abilities and phases creating a unique battle once summoned. Custom mission settings offer an easy or harder experience and provide some randomness to each mission.

Unnatural Investigations is a multiplayer team-based action shooter with horror elements. You can play it solo but it's meant to be played with friends.

Single-player mode will come as a free DLC later. 

Current State

  • Two medium-sized levels to explore, search for clues, eliminate enemies, and destroy the boss

  • One boss class with 3 different boss types

  • Custom match/mission modifiers

  • Private and public servers

  • Up to 4 players Co-op play
1596360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
